items.sentence: Tom hangs his clothes, then arranges them by color.
Tom tried to pass off an imitation as the original.
I've been waiting for you for ages. Where were you?
Maybe we should wait another week. There's no rush.
I assure you that I'd do that if I were allowed to.
Tom will probably be the first person to volunteer.
Tom is the one who usually ends up feeding our dog.
Tom seemed surprised when he saw Mary at the party.
Here are some things that we need to watch out for.
How many hours a week do you spend studying French?
